Sentence: Pyrosequencing of in total 33 subsamples ( Table S1) was performed at the Norwegian Sequencing Center ( Oslo, Norway) using the 454 FLX sequencer ( Roche, Basel, Switzerland) with Titanium chemistry.
The 454 pyrosequencing was carried out on the GS FLX + system using the XL + chemistry following the manufacturers recommendations ( Roche, Basel, Switzerland).

It has previously been demonstrated that the 454 and Illumina platforms sample the same fraction of diversity and produce similar relative abundances of genes and genomes ( 63), although 454 does produce fewer reads per sequencing run ( addressed below).
Sequencing of the amplified V3V4 region libraries was performed using a MiSeq next - generation sequencer ( Illumina) with 2250 nt paired - end technology ( PE), using the v2 Illumina kit.
